trans-unit.target: TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON3_00000_DD3ANNOUNCE_000_000<tab>(-Mechanical Voice-)Intruder detected. Initiating countermeasures. Commencing emergency deployment of proto-Dalamud.
TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON3_00000_DD3ANNOUNCE_000_015<tab>(-Mechanical Voice-)Warning. Excalibur separated from organic host. Initializing transfer to floor 100 for surveillance.
